sdn.signal[:].value_error_index.description: Index in the error_description list for "value" {constant}

sdn.signal[:].description: Dictionary of the signal names and definitions which can be allocated to the SDN

sdn.topic_list[:].names.description: Names of the group of SDN signals {static}

sdn.signal[:].allocated_position.description: Allocation of signal to a position in the SDN (1..N); this will be implementation specific {constant}

sdn.topic_list[:].description: List of the groups of signals used at different reading and writing points; this is an implementation detail which might change

sdn.ids_properties.description: Interface Data Structure properties. This element identifies the node above as an IDS

sdn.ids_properties.comment.description: Any comment describing the content of this IDS {constant}

sdn.signal[:].ip_normalise.description: 0 or 1 if this signal is multiplied by Ip to generate a control variable; this usage is specific to magnetic control, but could be extended to other control loops {static}

sdn.topic_list[:].indices.description: Indices into the current SDN allocated list; it must be updated when the allocated list is changed {static}

sdn.ids_properties.homogeneous_time.description: 1 if the time of this IDS is homogeneous. In this case, the time values for this IDS are stored in ../time just below the root of this IDS. Otherwise, the time values are stored in the various time fields at lower levels in the tree. {constant}
